segments.text: I finally found an apartment that I want to rent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I saw it in this ad for apartments in today ’ s newspaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You found an apartment in the ads ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really did , but what ’ s so great about it is that it ’ s really affordable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , most importantly the apartment is beautiful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much is the rent for the apartment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s pretty cheap for out here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s what I said when I found out how much the rent was .
segments.speaker: S1
